text:
Hi Guys hello to all you lovely YouTube kids
out there, Jamie Oliver here now I know you

probably know that I love cooking, I love
food but you know what I love nearly as much

the holidays, wooo! SO what I've done is I've
gathered together a whole load of YouTube

videos that are gonna help you guys do incredible
cooking and cool hacks and things like that

over the festive period I'm kicking it all
off with a special selection of recipes from

the gang cooking on Food Tube starting with
my good old friend and my mentor Gennaro Contaldo,

you're gonna love him he's absolutely fantastic
ok what are you waiting for check it out!
